text:
Las Vegas, NV and San Francisco, CA

Several positions open in challenging roles at Zappos for everything from Engineering to Information Security and

Software Engineering (Java, iOS): http://jobvite.com/m?3J4wIgwM

Front-End: http://jobvite.com/m?3N6wIgwS

Great time to join us (current employee, not a recruiter) - Tech at Zappos is moving forward at a fast pace, come be a part of it.
